sentences.sContent: ...the most up-to-date information available on foods today.
...many complain that their school libraries do not have enough up-to-date interesting books and magazines...
...A student advisory board kept the food-service director up-to-date on what the kids wanted...
...Do you think you could pop through in bringing me up-to-date on their arrangements for the Italian trip...

synos.tran: 最新的，最近的；现代的，新式的

trans.tranCn: 直到最近的， 现代的； 跟上时代的
